name: part_004
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア3周年記念LIVE】大感謝祭！今日もバカみたいに騒ごう！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [twAfWd7qSWQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare finishing the performance of her song 'Fu-re! Fu-re! Eru-fure!'.
Short MC section immediately after the song where Flare thanks the audience.
MC section. Flare talks about the song 'Fu-re! Fu-re! Eru-fure!' being written by Hige Driver, thanks her backing band of 'Elfriends', and introduces her guests for the next song.
Performance of 'Smile & Go!' with Hololive 3rd generation members: Houshou Marine, Shirogane Noel, and Usada Pekora.

subtitles.original: エルフレ！エルフレ！
subtitles.english: Elfriend! Elfriend!

subtitles.original: ガンバレガンバレ　エルフレ！オー！
subtitles.english: Do your best, do your best, Elfriend! Oh!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！ふー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Whoo!

subtitles.original: いつもありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you as always!

subtitles.original: 愛してるぞー！
subtitles.english: I love you guys!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで...
subtitles.english: Alright, so...

subtitles.original: あ、エルフレンドのみんな、オイスタオイスタ！
subtitles.english: Oh, Elfriends, Oisuta Oisuta!

subtitles.original: でもね、まだまだ続きますからね！
subtitles.english: But you know, there's still more to come!

subtitles.original: 今回歌わせていただいた曲は、ヒゲドライバーさんに作っていただきましたー！
subtitles.english: The song I just performed was written by Hige Driver!

subtitles.original: エルフレンドをね、元気に応援したいなって思っていたので、
subtitles.english: I really wanted to give the Elfriends a cheerful boost,

subtitles.original: もう理想的な曲ができたかなって思っています。
subtitles.english: so I think it turned out to be the perfect song.

subtitles.original: エルフレンドの君たちはどうだった？
subtitles.english: What did you Elfriends think of it?

subtitles.original: エモくて、あ、え、泣いてる？泣いちゃった？
subtitles.english: It was emotional... oh? Are you crying? Did you cry?

subtitles.original: なんちゃって！
subtitles.english: Just kidding!

subtitles.original: はい、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Anyway, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: や、あの、演奏してくれたみんなもね、ありがとね！
subtitles.english: And thank you to everyone who performed as well!

subtitles.original: ありがとね、ありがとね、うん！
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you! Yeah!

subtitles.original: あ、ちょっと、あ、やばい。
subtitles.english: Ah, wait, ah, oh no.

subtitles.original: 女の子のエルフレンドにうつつを抜かしてごめんね。ありがとありがと。みんなありがとね！
subtitles.english: Sorry for getting distracted by the girl Elfriends. Thanks, thanks. Thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: ま、まだまだね、あの、今回他にもたくさん曲歌うので、
subtitles.english: Well, there's still more. I'll be singing many other songs today,

subtitles.original: 今、演奏してくれたみんなもね、一旦ね、あの、客席の方にお戻りいただいて、
subtitles.english: so everyone who performed just now, please return to your seats for a moment,

subtitles.original: 次の曲をね、待ってほしいかなと思います！
subtitles.english: and I hope you look forward to the next song!

subtitles.original: 演奏してくれたエルフレンドたちに盛大な拍手を！
subtitles.english: A big round of applause for the Elfriends who performed!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thank you!

subtitles.original: ふーふーふー！
subtitles.english: Whoo-hoo-hoo!

subtitles.original: 行った？行った？
subtitles.english: Did they go? Did they go?

subtitles.original: あ、行っちゃった。これはこれで寂しいね。
subtitles.english: Ah, they're gone. This is a bit lonely in its own way.

subtitles.original: でもね、ちゃんと前にもね、エルフレンドが二人演奏したり、あ、ぼーっとしたりとかしてくれてるので、
subtitles.english: But you see, there are two Elfriends in front of me, performing... or just spacing out,

subtitles.original: え、私寂しくない。
subtitles.english: so I'm not lonely.

subtitles.original: 僕にも...あ、あそこにも小さなエルフレがなんかいましたね。小さな。
subtitles.english: Even for me... oh, there was a tiny Elfriend over there too. A tiny one.

subtitles.original: エルフレンドが見えましたね。はい。
subtitles.english: I could see an Elfriend. Yes.

subtitles.original: じゃあね、エルフレンドみんなね、いっぱいペンライト振る仕事、よろしくお願いしますよ！
subtitles.english: So, Elfriends, please do your job of waving those penlights a lot!

subtitles.original: はい！ではね、次はですね、お待ちかねかと思うので、
subtitles.english: Alright! Next up, since I think it's what you've been waiting for,

subtitles.original: あの曲を、ゲストのみんなと歌っちゃおうかなって思います！
subtitles.english: I'm going to sing THAT song with some guests!

subtitles.original: ゲストっつってもね、ま、わかってるね！
subtitles.english: Even when I say guests, well, you already know!

subtitles.original: 三期生のみんなと一緒にあの曲を歌うぞー！
subtitles.english: I'm going to sing that song with all the 3rd gen members!

subtitles.original: いってみよー！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: こんぬいー！準備はいいかー？今日はみんなで騒ぎましょう！せーの！
subtitles.english: Kon-nui! Are you ready? Let's make some noise together today! One, two!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai-hai!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイハイ！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai-hai! Yay!

subtitles.original:
Smile & Go!
作詞・作曲・編曲：渡辺あきと / 桃流浩純
subtitles.english:
Smile & Go!
Lyrics/Music/Arrangement: Akito Watanabe / Hirozumi Momoru

subtitles.original: やってきました　みんなに会える時間です
subtitles.english: The time has finally come for us to meet everyone

subtitles.original: 歌とかゲームとか見てほしくて
subtitles.english: I want you to see our songs and games

subtitles.original: あっという間に過ぎてしまう毎日に
subtitles.english: In these days that seem to pass in the blink of an eye

subtitles.original: 乗り遅れないように手繋ごう
subtitles.english: Let's hold hands so we don't get left behind

subtitles.original: 気付けば隣にいてくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for being by my side before I knew it

subtitles.original: どんな高い壁だってひとっ飛びで飛び越えて
subtitles.english: We'll leap over even the highest walls in one bound

subtitles.original: 誰も見たことない世界に　みんなで行こうよ
subtitles.english: Let's all go together to a world no one has ever seen

subtitles.original: 君と Smile & Go! 楽しんだもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile & Go! The one who has fun wins

subtitles.original: 君と Smile & Go! ハジけたもん勝ち
subtitles.english: With you, Smile & Go! The one who lets loose wins

subtitles.original: ここに笑顔で
subtitles.english: With a smile here

subtitles.original: 集まれば
subtitles.english: When we gather

subtitles.original: 最高でしょ！
subtitles.english: It's the best, right!

subtitles.original: 僕ら Smile & Go! いつも全力で
subtitles.english: We, Smile & Go! Always with all our might

subtitles.original: 僕ら Smile & Go! 遊びまくろう
subtitles.english: We, Smile & Go! Let's play our hearts out

subtitles.original: だって
subtitles.english: Because

subtitles.original: そうさ
subtitles.english: That's right

subtitles.original: この日常が　大切な宝物だよ
subtitles.english: This everyday life is a precious treasure

subtitles.original: Smile & Go!
subtitles.english: Smile & Go!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai-hai!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイハイ！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai-hai! Yay!

subtitles.original: 雑談配信　今日はまったり行きましょう
subtitles.english: Chit-chat stream, let's take it easy today

subtitles.original: たわいない話　聞いてほしくて
subtitles.english: I want you to hear our trivial talk

subtitles.original: たまにはお休みしようと思ったけれど
subtitles.english: I thought about taking a break once in a while

subtitles.original: やっぱり晩酌配信しちゃおうかな
subtitles.english: But maybe I'll do a late-night drinking stream after all

subtitles.original: ありふれたこの時も　一緒に過ごしたいな
subtitles.english: I want to spend even these ordinary moments with you

subtitles.original: いつの間にかキラキラと　何よりも輝いて
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, it's sparkling and shining more than anything

subtitles.original: 言葉にはできない思いが　溢れ出しちゃうよ
subtitles.english: Feelings that can't be put into words are overflowing

subtitles.original: 君と Let's Enjoy! 歌ってみようよ
subtitles.english: With you, Let's Enjoy! Let's try singing

subtitles.original: 君と Let's Enjoy! 心はひとつに
subtitles.english: With you, Let's Enjoy! Our hearts are as one

subtitles.original: どこにいたって
subtitles.english: No matter where you are

subtitles.original: 優しさは届いてるよ
subtitles.english: The kindness is reaching you

subtitles.original: 僕ら Let's Enjoy! テンション上げてさ
subtitles.english: We, Let's Enjoy! Let's get hyped up

subtitles.original: 僕ら Let's Enjoy! はしゃぎまくろう
subtitles.english: We, Let's Enjoy! Let's frolic around

subtitles.original: きっと
subtitles.english: Surely

subtitles.original: そうさ
subtitles.english: That's right

subtitles.original: 明日はもっと　楽しいこと待っているから
subtitles.english: Because more fun things are waiting for us tomorrow
